title: Mid-Summer Italian Bread Salad
ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, peeled', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '1 cucumber, chopped', '1 small red onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', 'handful chopped fresh basil', 'small handful chopped fresh thyme', 'salt to taste', '1 (500g) loaf good crusty bread or ciabatta', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar (optional)']
